response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds great value for those seeking excellence in its field. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I estimate its worth to be significantly higher than $150. However, to make this opportunity accessible, I propose a special introductory offer of $200. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the chance for you to benefit from early access to its benefits. I trust that you will find it to be an excellent investment. If you're interested, please let me know so we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 200}
